entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
